data.event: The population was 49,963 at the 2010 census, which makes Burlington the 17th largest city in North Carolina.
Alamance County was created when Orange County was partitioned in 1849.

event.title: January 29, 1856, the last spikes were driven

data.event: On January 29, 1856, the last spikes were driven into the final tie of the North Carolina Railroad project, uniting the cities of Goldsboro and Charlotte by rail.

event.title: The next day, the first locomotive passed

data.event: The next day, the first locomotive passed along the new route.
